question: During the reign of Warren Hastings, Sadar Nizamat Adalat was established in which place?
explanation: During the reign of Warren Hastings, Sadar Nizamat Adalat was established in Murshidabad and Sadar Diwani Adalat was set up in Calcutta. Nayeb Nazim (Representative of the Nawab) was the head of Sadar Nizamat Adalat. Governor and the Council were responsible for supervising the proceedings of Sadar Nizamat Adalat.
